p: According to the data released by the Hainan government [ 11], by March 24, 2020, 162 of 168 patients had been discharged and six patients had died, with a mortality rate of 3.6%. No new local cases occurred after February 19, 2020. The 91 cases in this study accounted for 54.2% of all the confirmed cases in Hainan, and a similar trend was found in the epidemic course (see Fig. 1). Of the 91 patients, three patients died. The mortality rate was similar to that of the whole Hainan Province.
